subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: New QuikScript font: QuikScript Geometric
msgSnippet: I still suggest that you try ToneText. It is a superior system. John Having a good day is our decision.
messageBody:
I still suggest that you try ToneText. It is a superior system. 

John

Having a good day is our decision. 

On Feb 10, 2018, at 10:19 AM, Tinyallen@... [Read_Alphabet] <Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com> wrote:

 

   Don't let that stop you. I created QSJ Block in a month of Sundays; the free trial for the font-maker was only a month, and I could only work on it weekends.

   While the font itself was a non-worker (I don't know diddly about kerning QS), the letterforms themselves were recycled into another font. So, not a wasted effort.

   Sorry about leaving your message unapproved so long, I seem to be the only moderator. Your account is now cleared to send messages unmoderated. I regret the necessity, but we've all been to unmoderated newsgroups, with the spam and undesirable messages.
